data.description: Browse directory contents in Dancer web apps
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Namespace choice: it's a Dancer ::Plugin that allows a ::Directory
    to be Viewed.

    Uniqueness of my approach: the plugin allows to add the directory
    browsing feature without relying on the deployment environment (such
    as using Apache's mod_autoindex).

    Why I believe this module should be listed: come on, if
    Acme::MetaSyntactic::pokemon can be listed, then anything can.
